entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: MoneyTrack: Expense & Budget
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö$19.99 ‚Üí $19.95 [$19.95 ~ $19.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö$19.95
  • AnnualÔºö$6.00
  • MonthlyÔºö$0.99

Application Description

MoneyTrack - Smart Personal Finance Tracker Record every dollar, take control of your finances. A clutter-free budgeting app with zero ads, zero splash screens, and zero financial product promotions. ‚ñ† KEY FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Auto-Tracking: Seamlessly integrates with Shortcuts for automatic expense capture triggered by your transactions ‚Ä¢ Versatile Entries: Track income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management ‚Ä¢ Powerful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns through pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly spot financial issues ‚Ä¢ Smart Budgeting: Create annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily allowance adjustments ‚ñ† COMPREHENSIVE ASSET MANAGEMENT ‚Ä¢ Unified dashboard for all account types (cash, checking accounts, credit cards, store cards) ‚Ä¢ Balance sheet and net worth tracking for real-time financial status monitoring ‚Ä¢ Credit card management system (payment alerts, limit tracking, grace period calculation) ‚Ä¢ Multi-currency support with exchange rates for all major world currencies ‚ñ† SMART FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Multiple Books: Easily separate personal, business, and project finances ‚Ä¢ Collaborative Tracking: Invite family members to create transparent household finances ‚Ä¢ Cloud Sync: Free data backup across devices with secure protection ‚Ä¢ Easy Import/Export: Support for importing from banking apps and exporting to Excel ‚Ä¢ Recurring Transactions: Set up automatic entries that generate on schedule ‚Ä¢ Payment Plans: Track installment payments with due date reminders ‚Ä¢ Custom Categories: Create unlimited category levels to match your financial organization ‚ñ† MULTI-DEVICE EXPERIENCE Sync between iPhone, iPad and PC with instant updates, keeping your financial picture complete no matter where you are. ‚ñ† FOCUSED ON FINANCIAL WELLNESS We're dedicated to one mission ‚Äî helping you achieve financial clarity. No investment pitches, no social distractions, just a clean and effective expense tracking experience.

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: Luwian
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $5.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Luwian Pro Annual MembershipÔºö$14.99
  • Luwian Pro Monthly MembershipÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images. The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel. Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography. Main Panel Features : Exposure control Focus + focus lock control Zoom White balance ISO Shutter speed Target grid Fullscreen Orientation indicator Current resolution indicator Torch mode: auto / on / off Flash mode: auto / on / off Camera switch menu Video recording switch button: Normal / Slow Motion / Time-lapse Shutter button Video recording button Dual camera recording mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) True depth backdrop camera (only iPhone 11 and later models) Shutter Timer Manual mode Auto mode Portrait mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) Analog film mode Cinetone filter mode Classic filters and VFX Menu Luwian Raw Magic Lite All Raw Magic Lite Features : Import / Select / Delete Media EXIF info and details Photo edit crop resize Video edit crop resize (BETA) Photo / Video adjust Photo / Video general filters and VFX Photo / Video analog filters Photo / Video cinetone filters All Settings Features : Photo quality setup Camera preset access and video recording FPS setup Time-lapse speed 2x to 10x Turn on and off the main panel filter view The shutter timer is set up from three sec. to 15 sec. About section and link to support page Terms of Use : https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

entry.title: Cultist Simulator
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $6.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

In-App Purchases

  • Forbidden BundleÔºö$6.99
  • The DancerÔºö$1.99
  • The GhoulÔºö$1.99
  • The PriestÔºö$1.99
  • The ExileÔºö$4.99

Application Description

SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES. BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck! In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age. Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we‚Äôre bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile. ‚Ä¢ Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history. Cultist Simulator doesn‚Äôt hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you‚Äôll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees. ‚Ä¢ Intense, immersive narrative ‚Äì Combine cards to tell your own story. A hefty novel‚Äôs worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end. ‚Ä¢ A rich Lovecraftian world ‚Äì Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies. Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft‚Äôs tales to an entirely new setting. Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics... ‚Ä¢ The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal ‚Ä¢ The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened ‚Ä¢ The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit ‚Ä¢ The Exile - Some there are who will not yield If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on ‚ÄúContact us‚Äù at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Codenames
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$0.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket. A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking --------------------------------------------------- Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone. Inspired by the Iconic Board Game ---------------------------------- Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada Chv√°til, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon. More Content, More Fun ------------------------- While staying true to the original‚Äôs clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames. Play Anytime, Anywhere ------------------------ With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges. Build Your Secret Agent Career ------------------------------- Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster! Connect and Compete with Friends ----------------------------------- Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words. Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

entry.title: Religion inc. God Simulator
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • All at onceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$0.99 ~ $4.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.29

In-App Purchases

  • All at onceÔºö$1.99
  • Game modesÔºö$1.99
  • Chests in the seaÔºö$0.99
  • All archetypesÔºö$1.99
  • DestructiveÔºö$0.99
  • ShamanismÔºö$0.99
  • TotalitarianÔºö$0.99

Application Description

You are reading this text. But why? Are you looking for a game, or has the game found you? Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game. It is a simulation of creating a new reality. Will you shape faith, or will faith shape you? Humanity has always sought light in the darkness. It has always longed to believe in something greater, something that gives meaning to existence. That‚Äôs how religions were born ‚Äì as beacons in the storms of history, as compasses in the ocean of life. What if you become the creator of a religion? What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality? You are the Creator. You are the source. You are the inspiration. And if you are reading this text ‚Äì you‚Äôre already in the game! All that‚Äôs left is to install ‚Äì and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions! Become the source of faith ‚Äì in the strategy simulator Religion Inc. Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness. There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity. Game Features *A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions! *Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more! *Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours! *Hundreds of real-world religious aspects ‚Äì and even more to come! Learn more about world religions! *Unique active abilities for each archetype ‚Äì perform miracles and change the world! *Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy! Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator ‚Äì Religion Inc. Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

entry.title: MagicKit Pro: AI Smart Toolbox
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life. Device and System Tools ‚Ä¢ Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state ‚Ä¢ Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage ‚Ä¢ Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details ‚Ä¢ Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running ‚Ä¢ Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage ‚Ä¢ Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space ‚Ä¢ Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries ‚Ä¢ RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance ‚Ä¢ Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance Network Tools ‚Ä¢ Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed ‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status ‚Ä¢ IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses ‚Ä¢ Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude Security & Privacy Tools ‚Ä¢ Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options ‚Ä¢ Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases ‚Ä¢ UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats ‚Ä¢ Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options ‚Ä¢ Temporary Email: Create disposable email addresses for privacy protection Utility Tools ‚Ä¢ Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements ‚Ä¢ Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies ‚Ä¢ Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support ‚Ä¢ Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status ‚Ä¢ Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events ‚Ä¢ Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks ‚Ä¢ QR Scanner: Scan QR codes instantly ‚Ä¢ Document & Card Scanner: Capture and save high-quality document scans with AI-powered text recognition ‚Ä¢ Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors ‚Ä¢ Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app ‚Ä¢ Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone ‚Ä¢ Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session ‚Ä¢ Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness ‚Ä¢ Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup ‚Ä¢ Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more ‚Ä¢ Color Palettes Studio: Create, extract, and manage beautiful color palettes from images or manually using color pickers ‚Äî perfect for designers and creatives Highlights ‚Ä¢ Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools ‚Ä¢ Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities ‚Ä¢ No ads or in-app purchases ‚Ä¢ Lightweight and battery-efficient ‚Ä¢ Compatible with all iOS devices ‚Ä¢ Frequent updates with new tools ‚Ä¢ Built with privacy and performance in mind ‚Ä¢ Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations Perfect for ‚Ä¢ Device monitoring and optimization ‚Ä¢ Everyday measurement and conversion tasks ‚Ä¢ Scanning documents and QR codes ‚Ä¢ Cleaning up photo storage and contacts ‚Ä¢ Creating and managing countdowns with reminders ‚Ä¢ Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters ‚Ä¢ Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control ‚Ä¢ Performing simple network diagnostics ‚Ä¢ Generating secure passwords and managing privacy ‚Ä¢ Taking quick notes and organizing information ‚Ä¢ Designing and managing color palettes for creative projects Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.

entry.title: ¬µBrowser: Watch Web Browser
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

Application Description

¬µBrowser is the micro browser for your Apple Watch. ¬µBrowser is the quick way to do some basic browsing on your Apple Watch when it is necessary. While it is limited it is good way to browse the web when you have no other device around. Features: - Open any URL (Entering a URL works especially good with the new Series 7 keyboard) - Search the web with DuckDuckGo - See your last visited pages - Save pages from the history to your favorites - iOS companion app to manage bookmarks - Complications to quickly access the browser from the watch face Please note: ¬µBrowser is a limited browsing experience. At first it is limited by the device size. Then there are limitations regarding Javascript and large webpages. Login on pages will most likely not work. There is no back button (swiping still works) you need to start a new sessions.
